text: aur hamane narak ke rakshak farishte hee banaaye hain aur unakee sankhya ko kaafiron ke lie pareeksha bana diya gaya hai. taaki vishvaas kar len ahle[1] kitaab aur badhen jo eemaan laaye hain eemaan mein aur sandeh na karen jo pustak diye gaye hain aur eemaan vaale aur taaki kahen ve jinake dilon mein (dvidha ka) rog hai tatha kaafir[2] ki kya taatpary hai allaah ka is udaaharan se? aise hee kupath karata hai allaah jise chaahata hai aur sammaarg darshaata hai, jise chaahata hai aur nahin jaanata hai aapake paalanahaar kee senaon ko usake siva koee aur tatha nahin hai ye narak kee charcha, kintu manushy kee shiksha ke lie
